attributes.action: Consider mandatory life sentences for those found to be guilty of torture/murder in the case of the death of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that this is a case which warrants a full life sentence due to the cruel and inhumane way in which Baby P was treated during his short life.

The manner in which he was treated suggests extreme sadism was used in a callous and intentional manner.

This is one case where life should mean life I feel.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
